title: Unable to open client because of RADS Error
body: Happened on June 28th, attempted to fix since then but couldn't. I did like 30+ solutions but none worked. If anyone can help I'd appreciate it :D. My ISP is TPG if anyone else is having any problems with the same isp.

replies.body:
RADS Error
Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.

Hey there,

In the future could you reply to me using the "reply" button below my posts as this gives us a notification :) (image below)
http://puu.sh/pOjVG/90dbf99de4.png

Anyway, have you already tried [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)?

Sorry about that xD, haven't used this in a few years so I forgot about it.

I have, oh btw, I told a friend of mine I couldn't play because of it, and he said he knew 3 other people having the same RADS problem, so I think its just a local thing. Hopefully it should be gone soon if it is. I have tried I think every riot given solution to the problem so rip. Also went through around 15-20 pages of google with no luck, its why I'm hoping the problem is local.
Have you tried contacting your ISP about this problem?
I haven't, I'm 16 so I don't really have an idea on how to ;-;. I was kind of hoping a riot employee could check for me so would a support ticket be good? Just to keep stuff simple

Well, my best guess would be it would be a problem on your ISP's end of things (Or a misconfiguration on your end) Player Support more than likely can't assist with the former and you'd need to have the account holder contact the ISP.

But do feel free to submit a ticket to Player Support, maybe they can assist you with something you haven't yet attempted.
Thanks, I've sent a ticket and if the last option is to contact the isp I'll do it and write again after. If It get's fixed I'll say ^

Hey there,

What is the exact error you're receiving?
